head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths NOSEWORTHY, BARBARA JEAN.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths NOSEWORTHY, BARBARA JEAN.

block.p: NOSEWORTHY-Barbara Jean. Of Brooklyn, on October 13, 2000. Beloved wife of Harry B. Noseworthy. Loving mother of Bruce Jerome, Lucille Marie Gutierrez, Kenneth Eugene, and Leigh Anne. Also survived by six grandchildren. Fond daughter of May Farrell and the late Eugene. Devoted sister of Diane Fitzroy and Marilou Goodman. Funeral service at the McManus Funeral Home, 2001 Flatbush Ave., Sunday, 8 PM. Private cremation to follow.
